title: Rush Hour podcast: All but one of Karnataka’s new ministers are crorepatis
content: In today’s edition, the Delhi Police books country’s top wrestlers for rioting, a report on assets owned by Karnataka’s new Cabinet ministers, and fresh violence in Manipur takes the toll in the state to at least 81.Scripted and hosted by Aena, produced and edited by Avinash Kumar.To get every episode directly in your inbox, sign up now⁠⁠.
